name: Civil penalty
text: §325-102  Civil penalty.  Any person or institution who wilfully violates any provision of this part shall be fined not less than $1,000 nor more than $10,000 for each violation plus reasonable court costs and attorney's fees as determined by the court, which penalty and costs shall be paid to the person or persons whose records were released. [L 1986, c 161, pt of §1; am L 1989, c 377, §2; am L 1992, c 162, §2]
